title: JK Haru wa Isekai de Shoufu ni Natta
original_name: JK ハルは異世界で娼婦になった
sinopse:
In a parallel world where sexism is king, young girls do not live... They survive.

Haru Koyama, an average high school student, sees her life turn upside down following a violent accident. It's only when she opens her eyes that she realizes that she is no longer at home. She is now thrown into another world governed by a patriarchal system. Having no particular stats, the young girl finds herself having to work at Blue Cat Nocturne, a bar, also known for being a brothel where everyone can fulfill their greatest fantasies...

(Source: Meian, translated)
